amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the food industry from initiating lawsuits against any person for damages or other relief due to injury or potential injury based on a person's consumption of a qualified product and weight gain, obesity, or any health condition that is associated with a person's weight gain or obesity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-249 to prohibit the food industry from initiating lawsuits against any person for damages or other relief due to injury or potential injury based on a person's consumption of a qualified food product and weight gain, obesity, or any health condition that is associated with a person's weight gain or obesity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 67 - 357 (Roll no. 529).
